item.title: When things start to get real… is it 30th already?
item.dc:creator: Ayush Yadav
item.description: Seems like yesterday when I was partying with friends for my GSoC selections, and here it is a day past 30th when the coding period has started. Since then many things have happened, I’ll be telling a few.The community bonding period was pretty important one for me as I got to know more about my pro ...READ MORE...

item.title: An overview of Hierarchical Progressive Surveys (HiPS) and the HEALPix framework
item.dc:creator: Adeel Ahmad
item.description: HiPS utilizes the HEALPix framework and uses it for mapping a sphere (in this case, part of a sky) and compiles / transforms it into tiles and pixels. Of course, this is in context of astronomical data. HiPS emphasizes on usability thus it tries abstract the scientific details while preserving them. ...READ MORE...

item.title: An introduction to coordinate systems used in astronomy
item.dc:creator: Adeel Ahmad
item.description: Before moving on to the coordinate systems, listed below are some common measures used in astronomical studies. RA / DEC RA (right ascension) and DEC (declination) are the longitudes and latitudes of the sky. RA corresponds to east/west direction (like longitude), while Dec measures north/south dire ...READ MORE...

item.title: How I got into GSoC-2017, the “smaller” things that made it possible
item.dc:creator: Ayush Yadav
item.description: It was late February, and like any year, semester in college was going just as chill as it could. It was my last semester and with only a few courses at hand, my days were spent surfing on internet for content or on Netflix. It was in these last few days, when I came to know about this year’s GSoC p ...READ MORE...

item.title: A comparison of response times using URLLib, GRequests, and asyncio
item.dc:creator: Adeel Ahmad
item.description: For the HiPS client as multiple tiles have to be fetched for time efficiency, concurrency has to be achieved. So, a comparison was done utilizing Python's threading library. The elapsed time was calculated using time. For fetching the tiles urllib, grequests, aiohttp, asyncio were used. The survey c ...READ MORE...
